p: The aim of this paper is to determine, by laboratory bioassays, the larvicidal activity of seven essential oils on third instar larva and pupa of C. quinquefasciatus. Essential oils tested include cinnamon ( Cinnamomum verum J. Presl), Mexican lime ( Citrus aurantifolia Swingle) cumin ( Cuminum cyminum Linnaeus), clove ( Syzygium aromaticum (L.) Merr. & L.M. Perry), laurel ( Laurus nobilis Linnaeus), Mexican oregano ( Lippia berlandieri Schauer) and anise ( Pimpinella anisum Linnaeus) . Larvicidal effect and synergistic behavior of the major components present in the essential oils included in the study are also tested.
